languages.text: {n}Соломон смотрит на вас, как громом пораженный.{/n} "Что? Неужели вас ослепила жадность? Украсть десятину целого сектора — это тягчайшее преступление и невиданное богохульство!"
{n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон смотрит на вас, как громом пораженный.{/n} "Что? Неужели вас ослепила жадность? Украсть десятину целого сектора — это тягчайшее преступление и невиданное богохульство!"

{n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich ungläubig an.{/n} "Was? Seid Ihr von Habgier geblendet? Den Zehnt eines ganzen Sektors zu stehlen, ist ein ruchloses Verbrechen und eine beispiellose Blasphemie!"
languages.original_text: {n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich ungläubig an.{/n} "Was? Seid Ihr von Habgier geblendet? Den Zehnt eines ganzen Sektors zu stehlen, ist ein ruchloses Verbrechen und eine beispiellose Blasphemie!"

languages.text: {n}Surpris, Solomorne vous lance un regard incrédule.{/n} « Pardon ? Vous seriez-vous laissé aveugler par l'avarice ? Voler la dîme d'un secteur entier est un crime odieux doublé d'un acte blasphématoire sans précédent ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Surpris, Solomorne vous lance un regard incrédule.{/n} « Pardon ? Vous seriez-vous laissé aveugler par l'avarice ? Voler la dîme d'un secteur entier est un crime odieux doublé d'un acte blasphématoire sans précédent ! »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙吓了一大跳，以难以置信的目光打量着你。{/n}“你说什么？你是被贪婪蒙蔽了吗？窃取整个星区的什一税是令人发指的罪行！是前所未有的亵渎行为！”
languages.original_text: {n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙吓了一大跳，以难以置信的目光打量着你。{/n}“你说什么？你是被贪婪蒙蔽了吗？窃取整个星区的什一税是令人发指的罪行！是前所未有的亵渎行为！”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, atónito, te lanza una mirada de incredulidad.{/n} «¿Cómo? ¿L{mf|e|a} ha cegado la avaricia? ¡Robar el diezmo de todo un sector es un crimen terrible y una blasfemia sin precedentes!».
languages.original_text: {n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, atónito, te lanza una mirada de incredulidad.{/n} «¿Cómo? ¿L{mf|e|a} ha cegado la avaricia? ¡Robar el diezmo de todo un sector es un crimen terrible y una blasfemia sin precedentes!».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは驚き、信じられないという表情であなたを見つめた。{/n}「何だって？強欲に目がくらんだのですか？星域全体の租税を盗むなんて、これは極悪非道の犯罪であり、前代未聞の冒涜行為です！」
languages.original_text: {n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは驚き、信じられないという表情であなたを見つめた。{/n}「何だって？強欲に目がくらんだのですか？星域全体の租税を盗むなんて、これは極悪非道の犯罪であり、前代未聞の冒涜行為です！」

languages.text: {n}Şaşıran Solomorne, sana inanmadığını belli eden bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Ne? Açgözlülükten gözünüz görmez mi oldu? Tüm bu sektörün aşarını çalmak, iğrenç bir suç olduğu kadar eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir kâfirliktir!"
languages.original_text: {n}Startled, Solomorne gives you an incredulous look.{/n} "What? Have you been blinded by avarice? To steal the tithe from an entire sector is a heinous crime and an unprecedented act of blasphemy!"
